Interface IEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
Engine, MyEngine
public interface IEngine
Interface for controlling the simulation engine. Used by the controller to interact with the engine.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    getDelay()
    Gets the current delay between simulation steps.
    boolean
    isPaused()
    Checks if the simulation is currently paused.
    void
    pause()
    Pauses the simulation.
    void
    resumeSimulation()
    Resumes a paused simulation.
    void
    setDelay(long time)
    Sets the delay between simulation steps.
    void
    setSimulationTime(double time)
    Sets the simulation end time.

  • Method Details

    • setSimulationTime

      void setSimulationTime(double time)
      Sets the simulation end time.
      Parameters:
      time - The simulation time when the simulation should stop

    • setDelay

      void setDelay(long time)
      Sets the delay between simulation steps.
      Parameters:
      time - Delay in milliseconds

    • getDelay

      long getDelay()
      Gets the current delay between simulation steps.
      Returns:
      Delay in milliseconds

    • pause

      void pause()
      Pauses the simulation.

    • resumeSimulation

      void resumeSimulation()
      Resumes a paused simulation.

    • isPaused

      boolean isPaused()
      Checks if the simulation is currently paused.
      Returns:
      true if paused, false otherwise
